name: pig dice ultra
description:
a computer version of the dice game.

rules: 

you can roll as many dice as you want, if you get 1 on any dice you lose the turn score.

you can always pass the turn.

 if you haven't rolled 1 (and passed turn) you keep the turns score and add it to your total score.

the first player to reach a total score of 100 or more wins the game.

--------------------------------------------

if you played zombie dice it's kind of similar.

I made this game  as a small-scale project.

the browser version shod fit the smartphone screen.
